questions.question: How well does the current data structure support efficient data retrieval?
How well is the data structure organized to support growth and scalability?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how easy is it to navigate the current data structure for data analysis?
How flexible is the data structure in accommodating new types of data?
On a scale of 1 to 5, how would you rate the data integrity and consistency within your current data structure?
